A4.text: the Ravens made their second Super Bowl appearance in franchise history, having previously won Super Bowl XXXV.

A5.text: The Ravens defeated the 49ers 34–31, handing the 49ers their first Super Bowl loss in their franchise history.

A6.text: The Ravens won 34–31 against the 49ers in Super Bowl XLVII.
